mapper.select: select a.article_id as articleId, a.title as title, a.time as time, a.view_number as viewNumber,a.category as category, a.pic as pic, u.user_icon as icon, u.user_name as userName, p.paiwei as paiwei, p.img as img from article a inner join user u on u.open_id = a.open_id inner join pace p on u.open_id = p.open_id
